sources.title: Yodelin' Kid from Pine Ridge
sources.description: Parker (LeRoy Mason) steals cattle from the cattlemen and blames it on the turpentiners. Then he incites the cattlemen to burn down the turpentiners trees. When Gene finds the rustled cattle he tries to kill him. Failing, he kills both Gene's father (Charles Middleton) and Bayliss Baynum (Russell Simpson) and has Gene arrested for Baynum's murder.

metadata.Plot: Parker steals cattle from the cattlemen and blames it on the turpentiners. Then he incites the cattlemen to burn down the turpentiners trees. When Gene finds the rustled cattle he tries to kill him. Failing, he kills both Gene's father and Bayliss Baynam and has Gene arrested for Baynum's murder.
metadata.Writer: Jack Natteford, Stuart E. McGowan, Dorrell McGowan
metadata.Actors: Gene Autry, Smiley Burnette, Betty Bronson
